readable.title: 3461114418_c27b4043a2
readable.content: A bicyclist is riding down a leaf strewn trail . A bike rider with a yellow helmet and red jacket corners a trail in a leafy wooded area . A cyclist in a yellow helmet is biking through the woods in fall . A man in a yellow helmet riding his bike on a trail through the woods . A man on a bike is riding on a trail through the woods in the fall .
